sentences.en: Chueh - min pulled the cork from the bottle and poured the wine.
sentences.cn: 觉民拨起酒瓶的木塞,给众人斟了酒.

sentences.en: Cork is a very buoyant material.
sentences.cn: 软木是极易浮起的材料.

sentences.en: Cork mold spray solutions have a tendency to deteriorate or ferment.
sentences.cn: 软木粉脱模剂溶液易于变质或发酵.

sentences.en: He pulled the cork, and tipped up the bottle and drank.
sentences.cn: 他拔掉瓶塞, 把瓶底朝上举起就喝了起来.

sentences.en: He untwisted the wire off the champagne bottle, and the cork popped and shot to the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 他拧掉香槟瓶上的铁丝封口，瓶塞砰的一声直冲天花板。

sentences.en: He was pulling the cork from a bottle of wine.
sentences.cn: 他正在启一瓶葡萄酒的瓶塞。

sentences.en: Hold the bottle and pull the cork out with the other hand.
sentences.cn: 握住瓶子,用另一只手拔瓶塞.

sentences.en: On the twenty - sixth, Lord Cork presented his preliminary appreciation.
sentences.cn: 26日, 科克勋爵提出了他的初步估计.

sentences.en: She merely filled the containers, sealed them with a cork, and pasted on labels.
sentences.cn: 她只是装满容器，用软木塞封住，然后贴上标签。

sentences.en: That fellow bobs up like a cork.
sentences.cn: 那个人经过患难,东山再起.

sentences.en: The cork came out of the bottle with a loud pop.
sentences.cn: 瓶塞砰的一声拔出来了.

sentences.en: The cork glass - holder kept the ice from melting and weakening the drink.
sentences.cn: 软木杯套起到了保护冰不速化,酒不走味的作用.

sentences.en: The seas grew turbulent, tossing the small boat like a cork.
sentences.cn: 海浪变得汹涌澎湃，把小船像漂浮的软木塞一样抛来甩去。

sentences.en: They should be used only with an " antidiffusion cork. "
sentences.cn: 他们应该仅用一种 “ 抗扩散塞 ”.
这个软木塞正好塞得进.

words.tran_cn: 带木塞气味的；用瓶塞塞住的
压塞机；塞瓶塞的人；出色的人
用软木塞塞住（cork的过去分词）
用瓶塞塞住；克制（cork的ing形式）
用软木塞塞紧,抑制,压制
抑制，堵住；用软木塞塞住

trans.tran_en: the  bark (= outer part )  of a tree from southern Europe and North Africa, used to make things
to close a bottle by blocking the hole at the top tightly with a long round piece of cork or plastic
to close a bottle by blocking the hole at the top tightly with a long round piece of cork or plastic
